data.title: Wachtell Lipton hosts Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis High School during Career Discovery Week
data.meta_description: Wachtell Lipton hosted high school students from the from the Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis High School for International Business Careers during Career
data.text:
Wachtell Lipton hosted high school students from the from the Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis High School for International Business Careers during Career Discovery Week.

Launched in 2020 by the Partnership for New York City and NYC Public Schools, Career Discovery Week brings high school students into the cityâ€™s most vibrant and important workplaces for exciting hands-on career exploration.

Students had an enriching day at our office, where they explored various careers in the law firm ecosystem, gained insights into our practice areas and the life of a lawyer, and honed their interview and communication skills during an afternoon workshop.

Click here to learn more about Career Discovery Week and how it opens doors for NYC youth: https://lnkd.in/eVHwdbxQ

We also recognize our volunteers who generously dedicated their time and knowledge to support these students.
